title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo: Top Shareholders – Brands Owned By
snippet: Santo Ficili is the Chief Executive ... as of 2025. He leads the brand under Stellantis N.V. and is responsible for shaping Alfa Romeo’s strategy, operational direction, and brand identity worldwide.

title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo: A Complete Ownership Breakdown - Tech News Hub
snippet: Stellantis has committed over €30 billion to EV development by 2025, with Alfa Romeo poised to be a key player based on dedicated models like the Giulia Electric and upcoming flagship electric SUVs.

title: Alfa Romeo USA - Luxury Italian Sports Cars & SUVs
snippet: No monthly payments for 90 days when financed through Stellantis Financial Services on 2025 Alfa Romeo Giulia, Stelvio and Tonale models.

title: 2025 Alfa Romeo Giulia: True Cost to Own | Edmunds
snippet: The 2025 Alfa Romeo Giulia True Cost to Own includes depreciation, taxes, financing, fuel costs, insurance, maintenance, repairs, and tax credits over the span of 5 years of ownership.

title: Alfa Romeo - Wikipedia
snippet: Alfa Romeo have been in a technical partnership with the Sauber F1 Team since 2018. In February 2019, Sauber announced that it would compete as Alfa Romeo Racing although the ownership, racing licence and management structure would remain unchanged.
